title: Slow and depressing movie
review: Not impressed with the film very disappointed the movie stretched long and the audience bored. Some of the audience even left halfway through the movie. I strongly not recommend this

title: Avengers
review: The reason why it's only 9/10 is because so many of my favourite marvel characters died. But other than it was beautifully presented hats off to Russo Brothers and Marvel they did an amazing job
